profile.shortBio: Bastien Chevreux is the developer of the MIRA genome assembler, a versatile tool for sequence assembly that has been continuously maintained since 1997. MIRA supports multiple sequencing technologies including Sanger, 454, Illumina, IonTorrent, and PacBio, making it a Swiss army knife of sequence assembly.
